verses.verse: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and <S%H7291>chases<s%> the east <S%H6921>wind.<s%> He <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H7235>multiplies<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> and <S%H7701>desolation.<s%> They <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H2986>carried<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> also has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> according to his <S%H4611>deeds<s%> he will repay <S%H7725>him.<s%>
In the <S%H990>womb<s%> he took his <S%H251>brother<s%> by the <S%H6117>heel;<s%> and in his <S%H202>manhood<s%> he <S%H8280>contended<s%> with <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H7786>Indeed,<s%> he struggled with the <S%H4397>angel,<s%> and <S%H3201>prevailed;<s%> he <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and made <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to <S%H4672>him.<s%> He found him at <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and there he spoke with <S%H1696>us,<s%>
even <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his name of <S%H2143>renown!<s%>
Therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> to your <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H6960>wait<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> for your <S%H430>God.<s%>
A <S%H3667>merchant<s%> has <S%H4820>dishonest<s%> <S%H3976>scales<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%> He <S%H157>loves<s%> to <S%H6231>defraud.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Surely I have become <S%H6238>rich,<s%> I have found <S%H4672>myself<s%> <S%H202>wealth.<s%> In all my <S%H202>wealth<s%> they <S%H4672>won't<s%> find in me any <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> that is <S%H2399>sin.<s%>"

"But I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I will yet again make you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the solemn <S%H4150>feast.<s%>

I have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and I have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H2377>visions;<s%> and by the <S%H3027>ministry<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> I have used <S%H1819>parables.<s%>

If <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is <S%H205>wicked,<s%> surely they are <S%H7723>worthless.<s%> In <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H7794>bulls.<s%> <S%H4196>Indeed,<s%> their altars are like <S%H1530>heaps<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> into the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> to get a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and for a <S%H802>wife<s%> he tended flocks and <S%H8104>herds.<s%>
By a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> he was <S%H8104>preserved.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H8563>bitterly<s%> provoked <S%H3707>anger.<s%> Therefore his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be <S%H5203>left<s%> on <S%H113>him,<s%> and his Lord will <S%H7725>repay<s%> his <S%H2781>contempt.<s%>
